title: Ticket #264: Improvements to old shadow's communication with ckpt server
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

This patch (1) changes the backoff algorithm employed when communication with the ckpt server fails from exponential to linear and (2) polls the execute machine during this backoff phase to see that the claim is still valid and gives up if it is not (since in that case, there's no point).

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (14).
